links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
mathematica: Table[ Count[ IntegerDigits[2^n], 0], {n, 0, 100} ]DigitCount[2^Range[0,110],10,0] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 20 2011 *)
prog: (PARI) Count(x, d)= { local(c=0, f); while (x>9, f=x-10*(x\10); if (f==d, c++); x\=10); if (x==d, c++); return(c) } { for (n=0, 1000, a=Count(2^n, 0); write("b027870.txt", n, " ", a) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Oct 27 2009(Haskell)a027870 = a055641 . a000079  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 30 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: a(99) - a(104) from _Harry J. Smith_, Oct 27 2009
